description.value:
Requirements You are in the oath of blades or oath of shields stance.

You channel and then manifest another aspect of your oath, gaining a benefit based on your current stance. This spell ends when you are no longer in either stance or after 1 minute, whichever occurs first.

  • Oath of Blades You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, which increases to +2 against creatures with the shadow trait.

  • Oath of Shields You gain resistance 3 to physical and shadow damage, this is in addition to your holy armor resistance.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.spell-effects.Item.KWZrivSJ8hZNYOss]{Spell Effect: Oaths Manifested}

Heightened (+2) The resistance from oath of shields increases by 2.

Heightened (6th) The status bonus from oath of blades increases to +2, or +3 against shadow creatures.

system.requirements: You are in the oath of blades or oath of shields stance.
